title: Trump Shut Down, Church Complaints, Sand and Soul, Big Game Commercials, Tom Brokaw, Comedy Roulette, Time To Put It Down, Tom Brady, Cardi B., Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Trump Shut Down, Church Complaints, Sand and Soul, Big Game Commercials, Tom Brokaw, Comedy Roulette, Time To Put It Down, Tom Brady, Cardi B., Closing Remarks and more.
description:
The show starts off singing and they are in rare form.  Republicans and Democrats have reached a short term deal to end shutdown according to Trump.  Church Complaints (Announcements) has Rev. Adnoid addressing the folks who wear camos but don't hunt and much more.  2 Chainz will have a commercial for Super Bowl.  Tom Brokaw has made racist remarks and promptly apologizes.  Comedy Roulette has food that you like to mix together.  Junior and Fool #2 have special pointers for the people.  Tom Brady says that the Big Game will not be his last game by a long shot.  (That's that confidence!)  Cardi B. announced on IG that she has a residency at The Palms in Las Vegas.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about life (the good, bad and ugly) and what you need to get you through it, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
